p.s: It means that Reece knows what is his grandparents experienced in her life and he knows why his life is sometimes harder thenthan others.
It means that the story has in this time a meaning for the black community.
The leaders and artists know what the young black Britains experience because they experienced this too and they want to help them.
It means that Blackblack people experienced they own journey to find a place in the britishBritish society and now they are more accepted than before.
Black peole are thankful about her journey, because they picked up lots of experiences and they think that in the future it becomes still better for them.
